title: adidas -- miCoach SMART BALL
description: Become a master of dead-ball kicks with easy to follow coaching guidance and near instant feedback on strike point, speed, spin and flight path. Compare your kick with the pros. Challenge your friends. Take your game to the next level.

asset.author: adidas
